overview:
Thomas Oppong is a technology blogger, startups analyst and a social marketing consultant. He is a Startup consultant focused on on blogging, strategy and business development.

He is the Founder and Editor is Alltopstartups.com (web and mobile technology news blog). In 2010 Thomas co-founded Dryve Technologies to build enterprise mobile and web applications for businesses and institutions in Ghana. He has worked with Meltwater Group as an entrepreneur in training in software development.

Thomas is very passionate about web and mobile technology and intends to be an angel investor in Africa to help internet entrepreneurs kick start their startups.
